entities.description: An activity type in the survey where an officer engages in pursuing traffic violators.
An activity type in the survey where an officer responds to a disturbance.
An activity type in the survey where an officer responds to a burglary in process.
An activity type in the survey where an officer responds to a robbery in process.
An activity type in the survey where an officer attempts to make an arrest other than the primary target.
An activity type in the survey where an officer responds to a civil disorder.
An activity type in the survey where an officer is involved in the custody of prisoners.
An activity type in the survey where an officer is investigating a situation.
An activity type in the survey where an officer is ambushed without prior warning.
An activity type in the survey where an officer encounters a deranged assailant.
An activity category in the survey that includes all other activities not explicitly listed.
The survey respondent who is a law enforcement officer.
The classification of activities an officer might engage in as reported in the survey.

relationships.description: Indicates that an officer engages in specific types of activities as classified in the survey.
Classifies traffic pursuits as a specific type of activity.
Classifies responding to disturbances as a specific type of activity.
Classifies responding to burglaries in process as a specific type of activity.
Classifies responding to robberies in process as a specific type of activity.
Classifies attempting other arrests as a specific type of activity.
Classifies responding to civil disorders as a specific type of activity.
Classifies custodying prisoners as a specific type of activity.
Classifies investigating as a specific type of activity.
Classifies ambush without warning as a specific type of activity.
Classifies encountering a deranged assailant as a specific type of activity.
Classifies all other activities as a specific type of activity.
